name: Soft Drinks Only
description:
[YO YOU CAN READ THIS IF YOU ARE LOST]

Hey ! Even with the tutorial everybody is having a hard time figuring out how to play the game so here a quick and easy recap :

In a game press P to PAUSE the game and have access to the detail of the score of your game in progress !

When you start a new level you got a random generated map with 3 types of tiles:

-Tiles where people can drink (BLUE ONES)

-Tiles where people can eat (ORANGE ONES)

-Tiles where people can dance (PINK ONES)

LEFT CLICK on a guy to select him (hold left ctrl to select multiple) AND RIGHT CLICK to move him in one of these three areas.

They each update the stats of the people using them respectvly:

-Drink give DRUNK stats (+3 per second) / FUN stats (+1 per second) / ENERGY (+1 per second)

-Eating give ENERGY stats (+3 per second)

-Dance give FUN stats (+3 per second)

When people are not using this tiles they LOOSE 1 stat point per second for each stat (DRINK, ENERGY, FUN)

When people get 0 to the FUN stats : They LEAVE (same as dying)

When they get 0 to the ENERGY stats : They DIED of exhaustion obviously

When they get 100 to the DRUNK stats : They start fighting

When people are fighting it gives extra point BUT they make people and themselves loose ENERGY stats so be careful to not let them die during the fights.

For each level of difficulty you have to score the maximum amount of points within a certain number of people DYING / LEAVING

Sorry for the rules to be not clear in the game, it's not very conventionnal game I guess, have a good time testing it out !


[INFORMATIONS]

Soft Drinks Only,

is an arcade strategy game, you have to control and make your people survive during a party.

Look for the tutorial on the home page.

Controls:

Escape or P in game to pause;
Left click to select (hold left ctrl for multiple select)

Right click to move


The goal is to make people survive the longest possible and make points.
There are three level of difficulty.
